mapper.insert:
select reply_m_seq.nextval from dual
insert into reply_m(rbno, wbno, id, content, rdate) values (#{rbno}, #{wbno} , #{id}, #{content}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select r.rbno, r.id as id, r.wbno, r.content as content, r.rdate as date from reply_m r, member_m m where r.id = m.id and rbno = #{rbno}
select count(rbno) from reply_m where wbno = #{wbno}
